mapper.select: select mname, email, mphone, m_id from member where m_id = #{m_id}
select pname, roomname, price, pension.p_id from pension left outer join p_room on pension.p_id = p_room.p_id where pension.p_id = #{p_id} and room_no = #{room_no}
select STARTDATE, ENDDATE from p_res left join p_room on p_res.p_id = p_room.p_id where p_res.p_id = #{p_id} and room_no = #{room_no}

select p.imp_uid, p.startdate, p.enddate, p.pr_name, p.pr_email, p.pr_tel, p.roomname, p.pname, p.pricecnt, p.p_id , pi.uploadpath || pi.p_id || pi.filename AS savePath from p_res p LEFT JOIN member m ON p.m_id = m.m_id LEFT JOIN p_img pi ON pi.p_id = p.p_id where m.m_id = #{m_id}
select t.* , uploadpath||p_id||filename savePath , decode(filetype, 'I' ,uploadpath||'s_'||p_id||'_'||filename ,'') s_savePath from p_img t where p_id = #{p_id}
select pname, h_id, addr, openhour, parkyn, homepage, phone from hospital where h_id = #{h_id}
